wikipedia_page.main: George William Richard Richardson (15 February 1899 – 13 November 1963) was an English footballer who made 34 appearances in the Football League playing for Lincoln City, Sheffield United and Bournemouth & Boscombe Athletic. He played as a left half. He also played in the Midland League for Lincoln, and in non-league football for Boston Town.

response: * George Richardson (footballer, born 1891) (1891–?), English football outside right who played for Huddersfield Town and others
